concept.definition: The main recipient for the message. Used for most services and for GP direct patient dispositions where the patient is being directed to their own GP and the GP needs to have direct access to the call information.

A copy recipient for the message. Only used for Post Event Messaging (PEM) to GP services where GPs receive a copy of a call report when a patient has been treated by another service as a result of a call to 111.
